testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlESSObservationMetadataRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.5.5 [Need to Share ESS Environmental Observation Metadata] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}
Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Username is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R679_Username_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R679_Username_Supported}
Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Password is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R680_Password_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R680_Password_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Collector Configuration Information (CollectorConfig) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R681_Collector_Configuration_Information__CollectorConfig__Supported = ${TMDD_N51R681_Collector_Configuration_Information__CollectorConfig__Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Observation Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.4.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R682_Observation_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R682_Observation_Type_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Null Value is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.4.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R683_Null_Value_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R683_Null_Value_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Owner Organization - ESS Metadata is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R684_Owner_Organization___ESS_Metadata_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R684_Owner_Organization___ESS_Metadata_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Sensor Specific Metadata Information (SensorMetdata) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R685_Required_Sensor_Specific_Metadata_Information__SensorMetdata__Supported = ${TMDD_N51R685_Required_Sensor_Specific_Metadata_Information__SensorMetdata__Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sensor Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R686_Sensor_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R686_Sensor_Description_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Value of the Sensor Range is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R687_Minimum_Value_of_the_Sensor_Range_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R687_Minimum_Value_of_the_Sensor_Range_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Value of the Sensor Range is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R688_Maximum_Value_of_the_Sensor_Range_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R688_Maximum_Value_of_the_Sensor_Range_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Positive Rate of Change is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R689_Maximum_Positive_Rate_of_Change_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R689_Maximum_Positive_Rate_of_Change_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Negative Rate of Change is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R690_Maximum_Negative_Rate_of_Change_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R690_Maximum_Negative_Rate_of_Change_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Rate Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R691_Rate_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R691_Rate_Interval_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Persistence Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R692_Persistence_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R692_Persistence_Interval_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Persistence Threshold is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R693_Persistence_Threshold_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R693_Persistence_Threshold_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Like Instrument Threshold is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R694_Like_Instrument_Threshold_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R694_Like_Instrument_Threshold_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Date of Calibration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R695_Date_of_Calibration_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R695_Date_of_Calibration_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Date of Last Maintenance is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R696_Date_of_Last_Maintenance_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R696_Date_of_Last_Maintenance_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Value Output is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R700_Minimum_Value_Output_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R700_Minimum_Value_Output_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sensor to Station Elevation Offset is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.19). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R704_Sensor_to_Station_Elevation_Offset_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R704_Sensor_to_Station_Elevation_Offset_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Embedded Material Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.21). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R706_Embedded_Material_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R706_Embedded_Material_Description_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Output Average Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.22). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R707_Output_Average_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R707_Output_Average_Interval_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Output Internal Units is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.23). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R708_Output_Internal_Units_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R708_Output_Internal_Units_Supported}

Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Initial Installation Date - ESS Sensor is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.24). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R709_Initial_Installation_Date___ESS_Sensor_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R709_Initial_Installation_Date___ESS_Sensor_Supported}

Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Begin Date/Time of Out of Service Period is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.25). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R710_Begin_Date_Time_of_Out_of_Service_Period_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R710_Begin_Date_Time_of_Out_of_Service_Period_Supported}

Step 34 CONFIGURE: Determine whether End Date/Time of Out of Service Period is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.26). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R711_End_Date_Time_of_Out_of_Service_Period_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R711_End_Date_Time_of_Out_of_Service_Period_Supported}

Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sampling Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.6.2.27). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R712_Sampling_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R712_Sampling_Interval_Supported}

Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Site Specific Metadata Information (SiteMetadata) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R713_Required_Site_Specific_Metadata_Information__SiteMetadata__Supported = ${TMDD_N51R713_Required_Site_Specific_Metadata_Information__SiteMetadata__Supported}

Step 37 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R714_Roadway_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R714_Roadway_Name_Supported}

Step 38 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - ESS Metadata is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R715_Linear_Reference___ESS_Metadata_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R715_Linear_Reference___ESS_Metadata_Supported}

Step 40 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Distance to Roadway is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R717_Distance_to_Roadway_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R717_Distance_to_Roadway_Supported}

Step 43 CONFIGURE: Determine whether State is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R720_State_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R720_State_Supported}

Step 45 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Access Directions is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R722_Access_Directions_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R722_Access_Directions_Supported}

Step 46 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Representativeness is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R723_Site_Representativeness_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R723_Site_Representativeness_Supported}

Step 47 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Obstructions is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R724_Site_Obstructions_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R724_Site_Obstructions_Supported}

Step 48 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Landscape is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R725_Site_Landscape_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R725_Site_Landscape_Supported}

Step 49 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Access Control is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R726_Site_Access_Control_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R726_Site_Access_Control_Supported}

Step 50 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Slope is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R727_Site_Slope_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R727_Site_Slope_Supported}

Step 51 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Grade Direction is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R728_Site_Grade_Direction_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R728_Site_Grade_Direction_Supported}

Step 52 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Wind Roughness is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R729_Site_Wind_Roughness_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R729_Site_Wind_Roughness_Supported}

Step 53 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Site Soil Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.18). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R730_Site_Soil_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R730_Site_Soil_Type_Supported}

Step 54 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Site Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.7.19). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R731_Unique_Site_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R731_Unique_Site_Identifier_Supported}

Step 55 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Station Specific Metadata Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R732_Required_Station_Specific_Metadata_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R732_Required_Station_Specific_Metadata_Information_Supported}

Step 56 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R733_Station_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R733_Station_Description_Supported}

Step 57 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Operation Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R734_Station_Operation_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R734_Station_Operation_Type_Supported}

Step 58 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Geo-coordinate Referencing Model is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R735_Station_Geo_coordinate_Referencing_Model_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R735_Station_Geo_coordinate_Referencing_Model_Supported}

Step 59 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Power Source is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R736_Station_Power_Source_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R736_Station_Power_Source_Supported}

Step 60 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Door Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R737_Door_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R737_Door_Status_Supported}

Step 61 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Battery Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R738_Battery_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R738_Battery_Status_Supported}

Step 62 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Line Volts is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R739_Line_Volts_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R739_Line_Volts_Supported}

Step 63 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Maintenance Group Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R740_Station_Maintenance_Group_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R740_Station_Maintenance_Group_Name_Supported}

Step 64 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Preventive Maintenance Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R741_Preventive_Maintenance_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R741_Preventive_Maintenance_Interval_Supported}

Step 65 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maintenance Calibration Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R742_Maintenance_Calibration_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R742_Maintenance_Calibration_Interval_Supported}

Step 66 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maintenance Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R743_Maintenance_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R743_Maintenance_Status_Supported}

Step 67 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Initial Installation Date is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R744_Initial_Installation_Date_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R744_Initial_Installation_Date_Supported}

Step 68 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Number of Devices is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R745_Number_of_Devices_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R745_Number_of_Devices_Supported}

Step 69 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Communications Method is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R746_Communications_Method_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R746_Communications_Method_Supported}

Step 70 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R747_Station_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R747_Station_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 71 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station IP Address is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R748_Station_IP_Address_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R748_Station_IP_Address_Supported}

Step 72 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Manufacturer is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.18). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R749_Station_Manufacturer_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R749_Station_Manufacturer_Supported}

Step 73 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Observation Collection Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.19). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R750_Observation_Collection_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R750_Observation_Collection_Interval_Supported}

Step 74 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Observation Collection Offset is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.20). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R751_Observation_Collection_Offset_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R751_Observation_Collection_Offset_Supported}

Step 75 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Transmission Interval is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.21). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R752_Transmission_Interval_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R752_Transmission_Interval_Supported}

Step 76 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Transmission Offset is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.22). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R753_Transmission_Offset_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R753_Transmission_Offset_Supported}

Step 77 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Transmission Format is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.23). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R754_Transmission_Format_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R754_Transmission_Format_Supported}

Step 78 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Station Maintenance Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.8.24). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R755_Station_Maintenance_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R755_Station_Maintenance_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 79 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Climate Record Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R756_Climate_Record_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R756_Climate_Record_Information_Supported}

Step 80 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Collector Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R757_Data_Collector_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R757_Data_Collector_Information_Supported}

Step 81 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Image Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R758_Image_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R758_Image_Information_Supported}

Step 82 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - ESS Metadata is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N51R759_Restrictions___ESS_Metadata_Supported = ${TMDD_N51R759_Restrictions___ESS_Metadata_Supported}
Step 83 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 84 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 85 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 86 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlESSObservationMetadataRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N51R675_Send_ESS_Metadata_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected
Step 87 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 87.1 VERIFY that element eSSObservationMetadataMsg exists.
Step 87.2 VERIFY that element ess-data-set-file-name exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.3 VERIFY that element ess-data-set-file-directory-path exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.4 VERIFY that element ess-data-set-file-access-protocol exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.5 VERIFY that element ess-data-set-file-access-address exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.6 VERIFY that element ess-data-set-file-access-port-address exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.7 VERIFY that element ess-observation-collection-frequency exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.8 VERIFY that element ess-observation-collection-offset exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.9 VERIFY that element ess-host-server-offset-minutes exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.10 VERIFY that element ess-host-server-time-zone exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.11 VERIFY that element ess-host-server-daylight-savings-in-effect-flag exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.12 IF TMDD_N51R679_Username_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 87.12.1 VERIFY that element user-id exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.13 IF TMDD_N51R680_Password_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 87.13.1 VERIFY that element password exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 87.14 IF TMDD_N51R681_Collector_Configuration_Information__CollectorConfig__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 87.14.1 VERIFY that element ess-observation-positional-order exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata
Step 87.14.2 VERIFY that element ess-observation-label exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata
Step 87.14.3 VERIFY that element ess-observation-units exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata

Step 87.14.4 VERIFY that element ess-observation-decimal-scaling-factor exists within each instance of eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata
Step 87.15 IF TMDD_N51R682_Observation_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content
